nodes.bodyText: Typo. Should be ADD_PHOTO_LIST here and throughout.
Ah, you've already fixed this (I was reviewing on a per-commit basis so didn't spot it until after I'd made the comment).
It's not immediately clear what these constants are for. Maybe change to PHOTO_SOURCE_CAMERA and PHOTO_SOURCE_STORAGE

Maybe change this to PHOTO_SOURCE_RESOURCES.
You could also create a separate inner class e.g. class PhotoStorageResource { int actionStringResourceId, int iconResourceId, int sourceType } and instead make this private static final ArrayList<PhotoStringResource> = { ... }; // list of possible photo sources and their associated resources
